subScenes.name: 初次咨询
subScenes.description: 学生向住宿办问候并询问宿舍类型

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi, I'm new here and I'd like to apply for on-campus housing. What options do you have?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你好，我是新生，想申请校内宿舍，有什么房型？

responses.text: I'm looking for a single room with a private bathroom, if possible.
responses.text_cn: 我想申请单人间，最好有独立卫浴。

responses.text: Any double rooms left? I'm cool with sharing.
responses.text_cn: 还有双人间吗？我愿意合住。

responses.text: Just tell me what's available.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动提出偏好，提高申请成功率

qaPairs.speakerText: We've got singles, doubles, and suites. Singles are most popular right now.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们有单人间、双人间和套房，目前单人间最抢手。

responses.text: Can I get on the waitlist for a single? I'm happy to pay extra.
responses.text_cn: 我能加单人间的候补名单吗？我愿意加钱。

responses.text: Double's fine, just put me down.
What's the wait time?

qaPairs.usageNote: 根据情况灵活调整需求

subScenes.name: 费用确认
subScenes.description: 询问住宿费用及包含的设施

qaPairs.speakerText: The single room's $850/month. That includes WiFi, utilities, and cleaning.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 单人间每月850美元，含网费、水电和保洁。

responses.text: Does that cover laundry too? I don't wanna pay extra.
responses.text_cn: 包含洗衣吗？我不想额外付费。

responses.text: Is the price negotiable? I'm on a tight budget.
responses.text_cn: 价格能谈吗？我预算紧张。

responses.text: Got it. What's the deposit?

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确费用细节，避免后期纠纷

qaPairs.speakerText: Deposit's $300, refundable when you move out clean.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 押��300美元，搬走时房间干净就退。

responses.text: I'll pay it now—can I get the application form?
responses.text_cn: 我现在就交，能给我申请表吗？

responses.text: Wait, do I pay monthly or upfront?
Cool, thanks!

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认付款方式，避免误解

subScenes.name: 申请提交
subScenes.description: 提交申请并确认后续流程

qaPairs.speakerText: Just sign here and email us your ID and payment proof.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 在这儿签名，再把证件和付款凭证发邮件给我们。

responses.text: I'll send everything by tonight—what's your email again?
responses.text_cn: 我今晚就发，你们邮箱再跟我说一遍？

responses.text: Can I drop off the papers in person?
Done.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动确认接收方式，确保材料送达

qaPairs.speakerText: You'll get an email in 3–5 days with your room assignment.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 3到5天内会邮件通知你的房间分配。

responses.text: What if I don't like the room? Can I request a change?
responses.text_cn: 如果不喜欢房间能换吗？

responses.text: Thanks! I'll check my spam folder just in case.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢！我会顺便看看垃圾邮件箱。

responses.text: Got it.

qaPairs.usageNote: 提前预防邮件遗漏，体现细心

subScenes.name: 道别收尾
subScenes.description: 礼貌结束对话并表达感谢

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks for helping me out today!

responses.text: No problem at all—good luck with your studies!
Appreciate it! See you around.
Thanks.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用积极语气结束，留下好印象
